segments.text: Look at her, so serene drying that plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Apron tied neatly, dress swaying slightly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the sinkâ€”water's gushing over uncontrollably.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: No plug, drain clogged maybe, total negligence.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Puddle's at her feet, slippery hazard waiting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Kids behind her, boy on the stool grabbing cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Stool's tipping, he's got a plate in hand too.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Girl's cooperating, reaching for her piece.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Stacked dishes nearby could all come tumbling.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside, the yard's tidy with bushes and fence.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel bad for the potential accident.
segments.speaker: PAR
